alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 08 at 6:48AM CDT until October 08 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 34 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...In Kansas, Smith and Jewell Counties. In Nebraska, Gosper, Phelps, Kearney, Furnas, Harlan, Franklin and Webster Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Stubborn scattered clouds may prevent significant frost development across portions of the advisory area, particularly along and south of the state line.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
